review: My sincere thanks to Dr Khusboo Bhardwaj for giving me lot of time and patience during the treatment.... God has blessed her with excellence in work and healing hands ... I wish her all the best so that she can bring smile on patient's  face and life ....Mam your support  and guidance  is deeply appreciable  ...Regards Priyanka Paul

My experience here is wonderful .Doctor did my root canal treatment so nicely, painless and comfortable treatment. Dental staff is cooperative and polite .
I am  happy with their treatment and the way they take care of their patients .üòäüòäüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am coming  again after 5 years and must say thier behaviour and work is outstanding 
Will recommend to all 
Have visited many dentist but they took my work seriously 
Can see visible results .

This was my first visit to this clinic and it was worth giving a try.
The treatment plan was very well made and special attention was given to my medical history and accordingly I was taken care of. I would definitely recommend this clinic to everyone

I book an online appointment with Dr.Shivani Gupta for 5th oct 10:30 am.
But on visiting , One junior doctor examined me.
She did not took my x-ray and ask her staff to do so.
She didnot throughly examined the problem and I am not satisfied.
The clinic is not recommendable.
Satisfied with the treatment received. Had pain in my teeth and gums. Also very sensitive. Neat and clean place and staff also courteous
They charge 5 times more amount than CGHS. For every visit they charge Rs200 for COVID protocol. *** **** ********* *** ** ***** ** *** ***** ** ***** ********** Not recommended.

Having bad toothpain since many months now,  had been ignoring it. But now it is very severe and so had to visit a dentist. Very happy at 32 smile stone dental clinic. Both doctor and staff very nice.
Very politely treated me .She explained my problem very clearly and explain treatment also. I am very happy that I came here.
I was very happy as doctor explained all  treatment and solve my problem in very friendly way before that I was very worried about my teeth.

Having severe pain in my teeth since one week, unable to eat also. Hence made an emergency dental visit to 32 smile stone. Was seen promptly and the dr advised root canal treatment. Very nice dentist and now I am pain free
Regular check-up done. Being a diplomat it's hard to find good dentists in India, happy to found one now. Satisfied with the treatment
I came here for bleeding gums. Cleaning of teeth was done and I'm much satisfied after the first sitting. Thanks to the kind and professional doctor
Got some fillings and teeth cleaning done. There was gum bleeding and bad smell coming from the mouth. Had to get that treated and help get my smile back. Thank you
Thanks again for the wonderful dental treatment. I always feel welcome free and visit every six months for follow up. No decay so far
Excellent service and treatment by doctor.. ... Experienced and good hand work. Will recommend to friends and family.

Great dental treatment at 32 smile stone clinic. Will recommend to friends and d family.gor filling s done in many teeth

Doctor very friendly, explain very well my problems explained brushing technique . I will follow this my whole life.treated me well.
